description:
Magellan takes his toxic attack to the next level by unleashing the hideous and deadly Venom Demon! If Jimbei and Crocodile don`t return with a rescue ship soon, Luffy won`t survive long enough to save Ace!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les fugitifs pris au piège la technique interdite : Venom Demon.
The Escapee Team in Trouble! The Forbidden Move: Venom Demon!
Побег на грани провала! Запрещённая техника – Ядовитый демон!
فريق الهاربين في ورطة! الحركة المحظورة: شيطان السّمّ!
脱獄チーム絶体絶命 禁じ手"毒の巨兵[ベノムデーモン]"
